original_text: If someone was born when his parents were not properly married, he cannot join with the Lord's people. His descendants may not meet with the Lord's people to worship the Lord either. That will continue to the tenth generation of the man's descendants.
korean_text: 사생자는 여호와의 총회에 들어오지 못하리니 십 대에 이르기까지도 여호와의 총회에 들어오지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: If someone was born when his parents were not properly married
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 사람이 그의 부모가 제대로 결혼하지 않았을 때 태어났다면

sentences.original_text: he cannot join with the Lord's people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주님의 백성과 함께할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: His descendants may not meet with the Lord's people
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 후손들은 주님의 백성과 만날 수 없다

sentences.original_text: That will continue to the tenth generation
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 열 번째 세대까지 계속될 것이다
